item.title: Flinker Services Terms (v2026-01)
item.description:
Version: v2026-01 Effective date: 2026-01-14
Back to latest Download PDF Print

Table of Contents

  1. Scope and precedence
  2. Definitions
  3. Deliverables and delivery windows
  4. What is included vs excluded
  5. Change control (scope expansion)
  6. Support Requests (Cases) — operating rules
  7. Customer responsibilities (Prerequisites)
  8. Response targets (best effort)
  9. Evaluation and production licenses
  10. Tier trigger (Standard vs Enterprise)
  11. Fees, invoicing, and payment
  12. Data and confidentiality (summary)
  13. Intellectual property
  14. Limitation of liability
  15. Governing law and venue

1. Scope and precedence

These Flinker Services Terms (v2026-01) (“Terms”) apply to the services described in the quote (“Services”) provided by Flinker GmbH (“Flinker”) to the customer (“Customer”). If the parties have a signed master agreement or SOW that conflicts with these Terms, the signed agreement prevails.
